Notes: No limit, but subject to the 60 second time out for file downloads as described above.

While the upper limit is 300MB, this is still subject to the overall 60 second time out for file downloads so it is possible that smaller files will hit that timeout. In addition, for embedded media, the size limit is 100MB for most embedded media types. For WAV files the limit is 100KB.
No limit, but subject to the 60 second time out for file downloads as described above.
